text: Rafique Ul Huq (2 November 1935 â€“ 24 October 2020) was a Bangladeshi lawyer and politician. He was the Attorney General of Bangladesh from 1990 to 1991. He was born in Calcutta, Bengal Presidency. Huq died at a Dhaka hospital on 24 October 2020 from problems caused by anemia and a urinary tract infection, aged 84. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:People from Kolkata Category:Bangladeshi politicians Category:Bangladeshi businesspeople Category:Bangladeshi lawyers
title: Rafique Ul Huq
